name: Vinland
startIntroPart1: Howdy to you Captain Alwida! You were the Captain of the first generation of the Vinland Pirates, escaping the cold seas of Scandinava to the sunny beaches and riches of the Carribbean. No weapons is strong enough against your tentacles as your strength destroy them all.
startIntroPart2: Mighty Queen of the Seas, your crew calls you again to lead them! While you will inspire loyalty to your crew, you will inspire fear to your ennemies. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Do you really thought we would stay peaceful ? We're pirates for God's sake!
attacked: Prepare to learn Davy Jones' locker combinaison!
defeated: My life on the endless seas came to an end it seems. May the frontier we opened stay forever like that.
introduction: Yarrr! I'm Alwida, first captain of the Vinlanders. Forget about the tentacles. Care for a drink ?
hateHello: I'm not in the mood right now.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Hey, let's have another drink! Once you're totally drunk, you'll forget about it!
tradeRequest: I know trading with pirates seems ridiculous but here's a good deal!

name: Taika
startIntroPart1: May the heavens bless your life, O Mighty Qin Shi Huang, first emperor of the center of the world. You have united what was once a pile of butes into one of the largest empire in the world. You know how to be cruel to your ennemies but you know also how to show kindness to your friends. With the council around your side, your quest to immortality is sure to be successful ?
startIntroPart2: Great Emperor, it is time to rule once more. Your subjects also dreams of immortality but as the spirit of a nation that will stand to the test of times. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: It is written in the heavens that my glory shall burn the weeds on my path. You are in the way.
attacked: Nothing will destabilize the nation. Prepare to beome nothing but dust.
defeated: At last, I have failed into my quest for immortality. I have become nothing but a fragment of history.
introduction: Welcome to the empire at the center of the world. *coughs* I'm the first Emperor Qin Shi Huang. Could you help me on the way to immortality ?
neutralLetsHearIt: You have been granted an audience. Now speak.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Balance is back between the three virtues. Maybe we can go to more important matters now.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
